DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting information impact lymphedema symptom , functional status , quality life treatment patient head neck cancer may help doctor learn disease plan best treatment . PURPOSE : This phase I trial study effect secondary lymphedema symptom , functional status , quality life treatment patient head neck cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Secondary Lymphedema Symptoms , Functional Status , Quality Life After Treatment Patients With Head Neck Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To examine association secondary lymphedema , symptom , functional status , quality life treatment patient head neck cancer . - To examine possible factor contribute development secondary lymphedema patient . OUTLINE : Participants undergo physical external ( e.g. , submental area ) internal ( e.g. , larynx , pharynx , oral cavity ) lymphedema examination . Demographics , background , lymphedema treatment information also collect . Participants ' medical record head neck cancer information treatment review . Participants complete survey Vanderbilt Head Neck Symptom ( VHNSS ) , Lymphedema Symptom Intensity Distress Survey Head Neck ( LSIDS-HN ) , Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy-Head Neck ( FACT-HN ) , Quality Life Scale , Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ( HADS ) , Body Image Scale .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosed head neck cancer At least 3 month since completion head neck cancer treatment Participating Pain Symptom Management Program VanderbiltIngram Cancer Center No current evidence cancer No metastatic disease PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : No active cancer Able understand inform consent PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics No concurrent chemotherapy radiotherapy
